sentences.en: "We were lucky to find a site like that, " said lead study author Wolfgang Haak, from the University of Adelaide in Australia.
sentences.cn: “能找到这样的遗址我们真是太幸运了，”来自澳洲阿德莱德大学的主要研究员沃夫冈·哈克说到。

sentences.en: Adelaide and on the second half were black Jiangong Corps.
sentences.cn: 和阿德上下半场分别为蓝黑军团建功.

sentences.en: Adelaide, capital of the state of South Australia.
sentences.cn: 阿德莱德, 南澳大利亚州首府.

sentences.en: Costs vary considerably depending on size, quality and location Adelaide.
sentences.cn: 价格根据大小 、 质量、位置不同也有差别.

sentences.en: He had managed to arrange to stay on in Adelaide.
sentences.cn: 他已设法安排好在阿德莱德继续呆下去。

sentences.en: I bet he busted up with Adelaide.
sentences.cn: 他八成是跟阿得兰德谈崩了.

sentences.en: Its fortune has flourished and declined with the economic development of Adelaide.
sentences.cn: 它的命运随着阿德莱德市经济的发展而兴衰.

sentences.en: Major Cities: Canberra, Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth, Adelaide, Newcastle, Golden Coast, Gelling , Darwin.
sentences.cn: 主要城市: 堪培拉 、 悉尼 、 墨尔本 、 布里斯班 、 珀思 、 阿德莱德 、 纽卡斯尔 、 黄金海岸 、 霍巴特、杰隆 、 达尔文.

sentences.en: Needs to work at Adelaide again. It is a short trip but tiring trip.
sentences.cn: 需要在阿德莱德再工作. 它是一次短的旅行,但是令人疲劳的旅行.

sentences.en: North Adelaide , which is chiefly residential bordered by more parklands, and contains two open squares.
sentences.cn: 市区北部主要是住宅区,四周被公园包围, 区内有广场两个.

sentences.en: North Adelaide, which is chiefly residential , is bordered by more parklands, and contains two open squares.
sentences.cn: 译文:市区北部主要是住宅区, 四周被公园包围, 区内有广场两个.

sentences.en: Our branch started in 2006 and sells wine for the Adelaide Cellar Door Group across China.
sentences.cn: 所以我们以最实惠的价格销售高品质的葡萄酒.

sentences.en: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Adelaide via Singapore on SQ ( E - Ticket ).
sentences.cn: 新加坡航空公司来回香港至阿德雷德经新加坡经济客位机票(电子机票 ).

sentences.en: The book devoted 10 pages or more to Adelaide where you're now living.
sentences.cn: 关于你现住的亚特莱,上占着十多面的记录.

sentences.en: The train backed out of Adelaide Yard on to the Dublin-Belfast line.
sentences.cn: 火车倒出了阿德莱德调车场，开上了都柏林-贝尔法斯特线。

sentences.en: They live in big coastal cities such as Brisbane, Sydney, Adelaide, Melborune, and Perth.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚人都居住在沿海城市,例如布里斯班, 悉尼, 阿德莱德, 墨尔本以及佩斯.

trans.tran_cn: 阿德莱德（女子名； 澳大利亚港市）
